bibl.title: The Acquisition of the University of Michigan's Portion of the Chester Beatty Biblical Papyri and a New Suggested Provenance.
Archiv für Papyrusforschung und verwandte Gebiete

bibl.note: Introduction. - The Numbers-Deuteronomy Codex and the Enoch-Melito Codex. - The Pauline Epistles Codex and Other Fragments. - The Provenance of the Beatty Biblical Papyri [near Asyut?]. - Conclusions. - Pp. 113-116: Image of the 'Memorandum' of 18 March 1934 in the Beatty Library. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Brent Nongbri, The Acquisition of the University of Michigan's Portion of the Chester Beatty Biblical Papyri and a New Suggested Provenance.

Introduction. - The Numbers-Deuteronomy Codex and the Enoch-Melito Codex. - The Pauline Epistles Codex and Other Fragments. - The Provenance of the Beatty Biblical Papyri [near Asyut?]. - Conclusions. - Pp. 113-116: Image of the 'Memorandum' of 18 March 1934 in the Beatty Library. - Avec résumé en anglais.
